name: GameJam2021DinoVsAliens
description: Basically you are a dino. There are UFOs trying to destroy buildings and make a mess. You may have little arms, but you have a big heart. Can you help you squid friend defend their buildings? You move around with the standard WASD, jump with the space bar and pause with the p button.  Be careful, somehow you got joined with the space time and time will only move when you are not joined with the ground. Are you up to the timey wimey challenge?
